t: Amazon Photos
s: Amazon Photos provides online storage. Safekeeping your photos and videos in the cloud keeps them secure, even if your devices (and the pictures in them) are lost or destroyed. Once you turn on Auto-Save in Settings, your photos are automatically saved to your Amazon Photos account.
